definition: a hat made with the fur of a beaver or similar material
details:
noun
- a hat made with the fur of a beaver or similar material
= example: a hat made with the fur of a beaver or similar material
= synonyms: beaver
- a pivoting roller attached to the bottom of furniture or trucks or portable machines to make them movable
= synonyms: caster
- a shaker with a perforated top for sprinkling powdered sugar
= synonyms: caster
